132.content:
You jumped from the bed and ran to the full length mirror hanging on the closet door. There, in your reflection, you saw your little sister, Miley staring back at you! Your first reaction was to scream but then you were hit with another shock. Your little sister sleepily walked up to the mirror and stood right beside you! "What's wrong, Jo?" Yawning, she asked. "Did you have a nightmare?"

"Miley! Somehow I turned into you!" Panicked, you wailed. "I was your big brother yesterday, don't you remember?!"

Miley, still half awake giggled tiredly. "You're silly, sis." Lightly, she said. "We better get dressed, we have to go to school."

You gawked at your little sister as she walked out of the room towards the bathroom. Once she had closed the bathroom door, you hard your cellphone ding; you had a text message. Shaken, you found your phone on a nightstand that was not there the night before. The message read, 'Enjoy your new life, Joanna'. -The Gypsy you ignored.

The second you read the message, it vanished and someone grabbed the cellphone from you. "Give that back, kiddo!" Irritated, a female voice said. "It's not a toy for you to play with!"

You kiss her once again on the lips and the next thing you know, you're standing opposite your body. Fortunately for you, Miley wasn't knocked out like before.

"See, what did I tell you?" You tell your sister putting your hands at your hips.

"I'm you." Miley says in a squeaky voice as she holds out her hands in front of her. They're way bigger than her own. To show her how much difference it is, you put your hands on Miley's hands.

"This is neat." Miley says as she jumps up and down like only a six year old would do. "Everything looks tiny, even you." She points at you. She then looks concerned. "There is something underneath here too, it's not like my pee, pee." Miley absent minded rubbed your crotch.

"It's nothing special. But what do you think of my powers? Cool isn't it?" You tell her.

"Yeah. So can we stay like this?" Miley asks in a pleading tone.

"Miley, we can't. Tomorrow's a school day for me. And for you as well." You remind Miley.

"Please. We can do it before school starts. Please." Miley bats her eyelashes as trying to persuade you. In the past it worked countless times with you and a lot of other people, but then she didn't look like a seventeen year old guy.

info.brief_description: you are a guy who, for some reason or another, becomes a female
info.description:
you are just a normal, average 17 year old boy. you are a senior in high school and play on the baseball team. but one day you somehow gain the ability to become female.

rules: anything goes, except gay sex. keep characters the same, use good ENGLISH and i specify english.

characters:

jo quin, you, average 17 year old high school senior. 6' 1'' broad shouldered.

rianna, girlfriend, 17, blonde hair, blue eyes, average breasts, 5' 9''. nice girl.

katy, rianna's best friend, blonde hair blue eyes, b cup 5' 4'', rich family, very popular, doesnt hate you but doesnt like you either

miley, little sister, 6, black hair brown eyes.

becky, older sister, 22, beautifull, perfect figure, nice ass, big breasts, real party girl.

rose, mother, chubby, chort, medium breasts, 42, black hair.

robert, father, stern 45
